tuv.seg: Adult education courses are designed so that you can return to education in flexible ways
Tá cúrsaí oideachais daoine fásta deartha ionas gur féidir leat filleadh ar an oideachas ar bhealaí solúbtha
They take account of your particular needs and circumstances as an adult
Cuireann siad do riachtanais agus do chúinsí ar leith san áireamh mar dhuine fásta
There are part-time and full-time courses available
Tá fáil ar chúrsaí páirtaimseartha agus lánaimseartha
A number of organisations provide specialist help and advice about returning to education
Soláthraíonn roinnt eagraíochtaí cabhair agus comhairle speisialaithe faoi fhilleadh ar an oideachas
You don't need formal qualifications in order to take part in many full-time and part-time courses that are on offer
Ní gá duit cáilíochtaí foirmiúla a bheith agat chun páirt a ghlacadh in go leor de na cúrsaí lánaimseartha agus páirtaimseartha atá ar fáil
Many courses are provided through your local Education and Training Board
Cuirtear go leor cúrsaí ar fáil trí do Bhord Oideachais agus Oiliúna áitiúil

These include adult literacy programmes and courses for early school-leavers, opportunities to return to study for the Leaving Certificate or other certificates and a wide range of vocational training linked to business and industry

Ina measc seo tá cláir agus cúrsaí litearthachta daoine fásta dóibh siúd a d’fhág an scoil go luath, deiseanna chun filleadh agus staidéar a dhéanamh don Ardteistiméireacht nó do theastais eile nó réimse fairsing oiliúint ghairmoideachais atá nasctha leis an ngnó nó leis an tionscal
Some courses are generally only open to you if you have completed your secondary education
Ní bhíonn roinnt cúrsaí ar fáil duit ach amháin má chríochnaigh tú oideachas dara leibhéal
These include Post-Leaving Certificate Courses and college-based training courses for apprentices, as well as full-time and part-time third-level courses
Ina measc seo tá Cúrsaí Iar-Ardteistiméireachta agus cúrsaí oiliúna a bhíonn ar siúl i gcoláistí le haghaidh printíseach, mar aon le cúrsaí tríú leibhéal lánaimseartha agus páirtaimseartha
However, you should check the entry requirements with the school or college as some courses make exceptions for mature students
Ar a shon sin, ba cheart duit na riachtanais iontrála a sheiceáil leis an scoil nó leis an gcoláiste mar gheall go ndéanann roinnt cúrsaí eisceachtaí i gcás mic léinn lánfhásta
There are a number of education and training schemes and supports available that can support you to return to education and training
Tá roinnt tacaíochtaí agus scéimeanna oideachais agus oiliúna ar fáil ar féidir leo tacú leat filleadh ar oideachas agus oiliúint
Education and Training Boards
Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna
Since 1 July 2013, Education and Training Boards (ETBs) replaced Vocational Educational Committees (VECs)
Ó 1 Iúil 2013, cuirfear Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO) in áit coistí gairmoideachais
All services provided by VECs will continue to be provided by ETBs
Leanfaidh na BOO an uile sheirbhíse soláthartha ag na coistí gairmoideachais a sholáthar
